comments: Did you see the new commercial it is so good!
I am glad to see Apex Dynamite taking a stand.
It was really special to finally see a company show what it stand for.
I have mixed emotions about the new ad; so far neither good or bad, have to give it more thought.
Apex should be ashamed of themselves. The new commercial is offensive and really puts the company in a bad light.
Take a breath people, the company can express its point of view. Personally I am ambivalent about it.
